name: B L I N D
description:
I would advise to download the game and play it on your PC rather than in browser for a bit better graphics :)

Super early concept game for WGJ#186 - Alternate perspectives.

Unfortunately I didn't have enough time to polish the project some more (a bit less than 2 days). So there's quickly put together small horror-ish game. I may continue it in the future as I really liked the idea so stay tuned :).
